head: What is the primary purpose of HTML?
options: To add styles to a web page
To structure and organize content on a web page
To add interactivity to a web page
To store data on a web page
answer: To structure and organize content on a web page

head: What is the function of the <head> element in HTML?
options: To define the body of the HTML document
To define the header of the HTML document
To define the footer of the HTML document
To define metadata about the HTML document
answer: To define metadata about the HTML document

head: What is the primary function of Hypertext in HTML?
options: To define the structure of a web page
To add styles to a web page
To define the link between web pages
To store data on a web page
answer: To define the link between web pages

head: What is the purpose of Markup language in HTML?
options: To define the structure of a web page
To add styles to a web page
To define the link between web pages
To store data on a web page
answer: To define the structure of a web page

head: What is the result of combining Hypertext and Markup language?
options: A web page with only links
A web page with only structure and content
A web page with both links and structure/content

A web page with neither links nor structure/content
;
answer: A web page with both links and structure/content

head: What is the purpose of a doctype or document-type declaration in an HTML document?
options: To define the title of the webpage
To specify the version of HTML used in the document
To add an image to the webpage
To create a hyperlink
answer: To specify the version of HTML used in the document

head: Is the DOCTYPE declaration case-sensitive in HTML5?
options: Yes
No
Only for certain browsers
It depends on the version of HTML
answer: No

head: What are the starting and ending parts of an HTML element?
options: Attributes
Elements
Content
Tags
answer: Tags

head: What are the three main parts of an HTML element?
options: Start tag - end tag - attribute
Start tag - content - end tag
Element - attribute - value
Tag - content - style
answer: Start tag - content - end tag

head: What is the content of an HTML element?
options: The text between the start and end tags
The start tag of the element
The end tag of the element
The attribute of the element
answer: The text between the start and end tags

head: What is an HTML Tag?
options: A collection of a start tag end tag and its attributes
Either opening or closing used to mark the start or end of an element
Whatever is written within an HTML tag are HTML elements
Holds the content
answer: Either opening or closing used to mark the start or end of an element

head: What is the relationship between an HTML Tag and an HTML Element?
options: An HTML Tag is a part of an HTML Element
An HTML Element is a part of an HTML Tag
An HTML Tag is the same as an HTML Element
An HTML Element is used to hold an HTML Tag
answer: An HTML Tag is a part of an HTML Element

head: What is the highest level of heading in HTML?
options: H1
H2
H5
H6
answer: H1

head: What is the primary purpose of headings in HTML?
options: To add styles to the text
To provide valuable information about the document structure
To create hyperlinks
To add images to the webpage
answer: To provide valuable information about the document structure

head: Why do search engines use headings?
options: To improve webpage loading speed
To index the structure and content of the webpage
To create a sitemap
To add metadata to the webpage
answer: To index the structure and content of the webpage

head: What is another importance of headings in HTML?
options: They are used for creating tables
They are used for highlighting important topics
They are used for creating forms
They are used for adding audio to the webpage
answer: They are used for highlighting important topics

head: What HTML element is used to redirect to a particular section on the same page?
options: button element
anchor tag (<a>)
div element
span element
answer: anchor tag (<a>)

head: What attribute needs to be added to the section that you want to show when redirecting?
options: class attribute
id attribute
style attribute
href attribute
answer: id attribute

head: How do you specify the ID in the href attribute of the anchor tag?
options: With the % symbol followed by the ID
With the # symbol followed by the ID
With the . symbol followed by the ID
With the * symbol followed by the ID
answer: With the # symbol followed by the ID

head: What is the purpose of an attribute in HTML?
options: To provide a title to an element
To provide extra or additional information about an element
To change the color of an element
To remove an element from the page
answer: To provide extra or additional information about an element

head: Which of the following statements is true about HTML elements and attributes?
options: Only some HTML elements can have attributes
All HTML elements can have attributes
Attributes are only used for styling elements
Attributes are only used for scripting elements
answer: All HTML elements can have attributes

head: What are the two parameters of an attribute in HTML?
options: Name and style
Name and value
Property and extent
Element and attribute
answer: Name and value

head: How should the value of an attribute be written in HTML?
options: Without quotes
Within single quotes
Within double quotes
Within curly braces
answer: Within double quotes
